neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Biometrics tutorials
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: Common tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related to template management, identification and verification of templates.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]ShowTemplateContent[/b] - shows all information of modalities and their propeties contained in specified template.[br] [b]Identify[/b] - permorms template 1:N identification (for all available modalities).[br] [b]Verify[/b] - permorms template 1:1 verification (for all available modalities).[br] [br] Faces tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with faces enrollment, identification and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]DetectFacialFeatures[/b] - detect face position in image.[br] [b]EnrollFaceFromFile[/b] - create face template from file.[br] [b]EnrollFaceFromStream[/b] - create face tempalte from stream of images.[br] [b]EnrollFaceFromCamera[/b] - create face feature template from camera.[br] [b]IdentifyFace[/b] - perform 1:N identification.[br] [b]VerifyFace[/b] - perform 1:1 identification.[br] [b]MatchMultipleFaces[/b] - find all faces in image and perform identification.[br] [b]CreateMultiFaceTemplate[/b] - pack multiple faces into a single template.[br] [br] Fingerprint tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with fingerprint enrollment identification, and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]ClassifyFinger[/b] - demonstrates fingerprint classification [br]. [b]EvaluateFingerQuality[/b] - demonstrates fingerprint image quality evaluation.[br] [b]EnrollFingerFromImage[/b] - load fingerprint from image and create template from it.[br] [b]EnrollFingerFromScanner[/b] - scan fingerprint and create template from it.[br] [b]GeneralizeFinger[/b] - generalize multiple fingerprint templates into one.[br] [b]SegmentFingers[/b] - segments slaps into one/several fingeprints.[br] [b]IdentifyFinger[/b] - perform 1:N identification.[br] [b]VerifyFinger[/b] - perform 1:1 identification.[br] [b]CreateMultiFingerTemplate[/b] - pack multiple fingerprints into a single template.[br] [br] Irises tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with iris enrollment, identification and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]EnrollIrisFromImage[/b] - create iris template from image.[br] [b]EnrollIrisFromScanner[/b] - create iris template from iris scanner.[br] [b]IdentifyIris[/b] - perform 1:N identification.[br] [b]VerifyIris[/b] - perform 1:1 identification.[br] [b]SegmentIris[/b] - segments iris.[br] [b]CreateTwoIrisTemplate[/b] - pack two eyes into a single template.[br] [br] Palms tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with palm enrollment, identification and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]EnrollPalmFromImage[/b] - create palmprint template from image.[br] [b]IdentifyPalm[/b] - perform 1:N identification.[br] [b]VerifyPalm[/b] - perform 1:1 identification.[br] [b]GeneralizePalm[/b] - generalize multiple palmprint templates into a single template.[br] Voices tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with voice enrollment, identification and verification (identification and verification is done througth generic Identify and Verify tutorials).[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]EnrollVoiceFromAudioFile[/b] - create voice template from audio file.[br] [b]EnrollVoiceFromMicrophone[/b] - create voice template from microphone.[br]
